name: Metta Legita
bio: Pianist, composer, and music educator based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Specializes in jazz-contemporary works and cross-disciplinary projects with international performance experience.

name: David Kim
bio: Professional recording engineer specializing in classical and contemporary music production. Has worked on multiple orchestral recordings and live performance captures.

name: Sarah Chen
bio: Experienced arts administrator managing concert bookings, international tours, and festival appearances for classical and contemporary musicians across Southeast Asia.
